short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy a quick and distraction-free search experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web View is your all-in-one solution for an enhanced browsing experience!

The Web View extension sets your default search provider to Microsoft Bing.
By clicking “Add to Chrome”, you accept and agree to install the Web View extension, set the Chrome™ default search to Web View, and to the Terms of Use, and Privacy Policy.

Terms of Use: https://webview.webplannerview.com/terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://webview.webplannerview.com/privacy-policy
